wikipedia_page.main: George Ryden (14 July 1940 – 12 December 2021) was a Scottish footballer who played as a centre-half for Dundee, St Johnstone and Stirling Albion. Ryden played for Dundee in the 1964 Scottish Cup Final, which they lost 3–1 to Rangers. He died on 12 December 2021, at the age of 81.
